p: Leftover EDTA blood samples were examined using an immunochromatographic strip method for DEA 1, a gel column technique for Dal and Kai 1/ 2, and new agglutination card test for DEA 4 and DEA 5 (and partially compared with gel column). Monoclonal antibodies were used for DEA 1 and Kai 1/2 typing and polyclonals for all other types.
